verses.verse: (A Psalm of David.) Hear <S%H8085><s%> my prayer, <S%H8605><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Give <S%H238><s%> ear <S%H238><s%> to my supplications! <S%H8469><s%> Answer <S%H6030><s%> me in Thy faithfulness, <S%H530><s%> in Thy righteousness! <S%H6666><s%>

And do not enter <S%H935><s%> into judgment <S%H4941><s%> with Thy servant, <S%H5650><s%> For in Thy sight <S%H6440><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H2416><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> is righteous. <S%H6663><s%>

For the enemy <S%H340><s%> has persecuted <S%H7291><s%> my soul; <S%H5315><s%> He has crushed <S%H1792><s%> my life <S%H9130><s%> to the ground; <S%H776><s%> He has made me dwell <S%H3427><s%> in dark <S%H4285><s%> places, <S%H4285><s%> like those who have long <S%H5769><s%> been dead. <S%H4191><s%>
Therefore my spirit <S%H7307><s%> is overwhelmed <S%H5848><s%> within <S%H5921><s%> me; My heart <S%H3820><s%> is appalled <S%H8074><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> me.

I remember <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of old; <S%H6924><s%> I meditate <S%H1897><s%> on all <S%H3605><s%> Thy doings; <S%H6467><s%> I muse <S%H7878><s%> on the work <S%H4639><s%> of Thy hands. <S%H3027><s%>
I stretch <S%H6566><s%> out my hands <S%H3027><s%> to Thee; My soul <S%H5315><s%> [longs] for Thee, as a parched <S%H5889><s%> land. <S%H776><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

Answer <S%H6030><s%> me quickly, <S%H4118><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> my spirit <S%H7307><s%> fails; <S%H3615><s%> Do not hide <S%H5641><s%> Thy face <S%H6440><s%> from me, Lest I become <S%H4911><s%> like <S%H4911><s%> those who go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit. <S%H953><s%>

Let me hear <S%H8085><s%> Thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> in the morning; <S%H1242><s%> For I trust <S%H982><s%> in Thee; Teach <S%H3045><s%> me the way <S%H1870><s%> in which <S%H2098><s%> I should walk; <S%H1980><s%> For to Thee I lift <S%H5375><s%> up my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> from my enemies; <S%H340><s%> I take <S%H3680><s%> refuge <S%H3680><s%> in Thee.

Teach <S%H3925><s%> me to do <S%H6213><s%> Thy will, For Thou art my God; <S%H430><s%> Let Thy good <S%H2896><s%> Spirit <S%H7307><s%> lead <S%H5148><s%> me on level <S%H4334><s%> ground. <S%H776><s%>

For the sake <S%H4616><s%> of Thy name, <S%H8034><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> revive <S%H2421><s%> me. In Thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> bring <S%H3318><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> out of trouble. <S%H6869><s%>

And in Thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> cut <S%H6789><s%> off <S%H6789><s%> my enemies, <S%H340><s%> And destroy all <S%H6><s%> those who afflict <S%H3605><s%> my soul; <S%H6887><s%> For I am Thy servant. <S%H5315><s%>
